class.rdfs:comment: A statement of the money due for goods or services; a bill.
class.rdfs:label: Invoice

schema:accountId.rdfs:comment: The identifier for the account the payment will be applied to.
schema:accountId.rdfs:label: accountId

schema:billingPeriod.rdfs:comment: The time interval used to compute the invoice.
schema:billingPeriod.rdfs:label: billingPeriod

schema:broker.rdfs:comment: An entity that arranges for an exchange between a buyer and a seller.  In most cases a broker never acquires or releases ownership of a product or service involved in an exchange.  If it is not clear whether an entity is a broker, seller, or buyer, the latter two terms are preferred.
schema:broker.rdfs:label: broker

schema:category.rdfs:comment: A category for the item. Greater signs or slashes can be used to informally indicate a category hierarchy.
schema:category.rdfs:label: category

schema:confirmationNumber.rdfs:comment: A number that confirms the given order or payment has been received.
schema:confirmationNumber.rdfs:label: confirmationNumber

schema:customer.rdfs:comment: Party placing the order or paying the invoice.
schema:customer.rdfs:label: customer

schema:minimumPaymentDue.rdfs:comment: The minimum payment required at this time.
schema:minimumPaymentDue.rdfs:label: minimumPaymentDue

schema:paymentDue.rdfs:comment: The date that payment is due.
schema:paymentDue.rdfs:label: paymentDue

schema:paymentDueDate.rdfs:comment: The date that payment is due.
schema:paymentDueDate.rdfs:label: paymentDueDate

schema:paymentMethod.rdfs:comment: The name of the credit card or other method of payment for the order.
schema:paymentMethod.rdfs:label: paymentMethod

schema:paymentMethodId.rdfs:comment: An identifier for the method of payment used (e.g. the last 4 digits of the credit card).
schema:paymentMethodId.rdfs:label: paymentMethodId

schema:paymentStatus.rdfs:comment: The status of payment; whether the invoice has been paid or not.
schema:paymentStatus.rdfs:label: paymentStatus

schema:provider.rdfs:comment: The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods producer. Another party (a seller) may offer those services or goods on behalf of the provider. A provider may also serve as the seller.
schema:provider.rdfs:label: provider

schema:referencesOrder.rdfs:comment: The Order(s) related to this Invoice. One or more Orders may be combined into a single Invoice.
schema:referencesOrder.rdfs:label: referencesOrder

schema:scheduledPaymentDate.rdfs:comment: The date the invoice is scheduled to be paid.
schema:scheduledPaymentDate.rdfs:label: scheduledPaymentDate
